name: The Adventures of Guy
description:
The Adventures of Guy is a small platformer game made in 48 hours during The Opposing Jam. The name was made in honor of Raspy Goo's lack of creativity, when he named the main character sprite simply- Guy. We then went on to name all of the sprites in a similar manner- Guy2, GuyJump, etc... When it came time to choose the name, we looked at the sprites, and the name came easily.

Creators

The Adventures of Guy was made by Second Last Studios, specifically Fireye, Meme8383, and Raspy Goo. Fireye and Meme8383 coded the game while Raspy Goo made the art.
